DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare physical activity behaviour rheumatoid arthritis patient healthy match control .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Behavior Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients Healthy Controls
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( RA patient ) : Rheumatoid arthritis Functional class I , II III Age 40 80 year Stable disease activity Stable DMARDS last 3 month Exclusion Criteria ( RA patient ) : Functional class IV Inflammatory flare
